mapper.select: select e.id as id, e.no as no, e.url as url, e.scratch_time as scratch_time, a.id as anime_id, a.name as anime_name from anime_episode e, anime a where e.anime_id = #{anime.id} and e.scratch_time > #{time} and e.anime_id = a.id;

select e.id as id, e.host_id as host_id, e.no as no, e.url as url, e.scratch_time as scratch_time, e.save_time as save_time, e.push_time as push_time, a.id as anime_id, a.name as anime_name from anime_episode e, anime a where e.anime_id = a.id and e.save_time >=#{beginTime} and e.save_time <=#{endTime}

select e.id as id, e.host_id as host_id, e.no as no, e.url as url, e.scratch_time as scratch_time, e.save_time as save_time, e.push_time as push_time, a.id as anime_id, a.name as anime_name from anime_episode e, anime a where e.anime_id = a.id order by e.anime_id desc, e.save_time desc

select e.id as id, e.host_id as host_id, e.no as no, e.url as url, e.scratch_time as scratch_time, e.save_time as save_time, e.push_time as push_time, a.id as anime_id, a.name as anime_name from anime_episode e, anime a where e.anime_id = a.id and e.id = #{id}
